TopicTitle: Mod Request - Similar To A Current One

Articles.Content:
Basically I want something like this - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113507-1-0-x-PersistentRotation-0-5-3](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113507-1-0-x-PersistentRotation-0-5-3) - Someone showed me it earlier, its pretty good - I use it for my station in order to make sure there is always the same side facing kerbin - However its really annoying on other craft - I would like the ability to turn it on and off for different craft - I contacted the mod author but he said he isn't supporting it anymore

A donation may be available if someone manages to create it!

Thanks!

> I would like the ability to turn it on and off for different craft 

Doesn't it already have that?

>Q: Can I still make vessels stop using timewarp?

>A: Yes, if you enable the SAS.
With mechjeb maneuvers sas can't be used - Plus no it doesn't already have the ability.
